pomppu.graphics
Class Image

java.lang.Object
  pomppu.graphics.Image
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable

Kuva-olio, joka toteuttaa Drawable- image object. Makes it possible to draw images with the drawable interface. Uses VolatileImage from the java awt library.

Author:
arkivika
See Also:
Drawable

         throws java.io.IOException

Throws:
